entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
